sentences.english: But he could only nibble two steamed buns of broomcorn flour at each meal.
sentences.chinese: 可是他每顿饭只能啃两个高粱面馍。

sentences.english: He just ate a little fish and took a shot of Kaoliang .
sentences.chinese: 他刚刚吞了一条小鱼，然后喝了一小杯高粱。

sentences.english: The jowar stalks collapsed into the mud and the grain turned black.
sentences.chinese: 高粱杆子倒在泥地里，穗粒儿变黑了。

sentences.english: Red Sorghum is an outstanding movie that is filled with beautiful imagery and lush colors.
sentences.chinese: 《红高粱》是一部出色的电影，它的画面漂亮。

sentences.english: The influence of various process parameters on the protein feed yield was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 最后，研究了甜高粱茎秆二次固态发酵生产蛋白饲料。

sentences.english: Red Sorghum (a). Directed by Zhang Yimou. China, 1987.
Brand and promote Red Sorghum in U. S.
sentences.chinese: 双方在美国推广红高粱品牌。

sentences.english: They drank and had a very bottle of Kaoliang spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他们二人对酌，把一瓶高粱酒喝得一干二净。

sentences.english: Similar to sugar cane , we can use sweet sorghums to do that in the very.
sentences.chinese: 我们很快就可以利用甜高粱提炼燃料了。

sentences.english: She has technical experiences on sweet sorghum ethanol and cellulosic for several years.
sentences.chinese: 在甜高粱和纤维素乙醇方面有多年的技术研究经验。

sentences.english: No more Gaoliang wine. I don't want to get drunk.
sentences.chinese: 别再给我高粱酒了，我可不想喝醉。

sentences.english: Chavez last week announced an increase in the regulated prices of corn and sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 上周查韦斯刚刚宣布提高玉米和高粱的管控价格。

sentences.english: They two drink together and finish a bottle of Grain Licker.
sentences.chinese: 他们二人对酌，把一瓶高粱酒喝得一干二净。

sentences.english: We stood on the high ridge, looking down on the flaming expanses of broomcorn.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在高岗上，俯察那片火红的高粱地。

sentences.english: They killed a bottle of kaoliang between them.
sentences.chinese: 两人干掉了一瓶高粱酒。

sentences.english: They made sorghum into pig feed.
sentences.chinese: 他们把高粱做成了猪饲料。

definition: Takahashi (name)/Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture, Japan/Highbridge (name)
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
